(25) a. New South Wales-syuui o osotta yamakazi wa yooyaku tinka no kizasi o misete-
`The forest fire which raged in New South Wales, Australia, is finally going to be
contained. The fire department headquarters of the aforementioned state has
New South Wales-syuui o osotta yamakazi wa yooyaku tinka no kizasi o misete- kita. [Doo|syuui |syooboosyo-honbu] wa kinkyuuzitai-sengen o kaizyo-sita.
The forest fire which raged in New South Wales, Australia, is finally going to be contained. The fire department headquarters of the aforementioned state has lifted the emergency measures.
